title: 给xx的一封信
paragraphs: A few plum rains^1000, a few volumes of lotus wind^1000, the south of the Yangtze River is already blurred. ^2000 The moist moss in the small courtyard grows purely in the rain. ^2000This season^1000, many people are inquiring about lotus lotus^1000, and the mysterious fragrance of jasmine floating at dusk. ^2000 I don’t know how many people will remember that there was a woman^1000 who once walked through the world in April^1000, and had an agreement with Liankai Xiaxia.

A person, a book, a cup of tea, a curtain of dreams. Sometimes, loneliness is so exciting, and only at this moment, the world will be so calm. The cool wind blows the pages of the book, and the smoke and rain make the dust seal in the scroll The poems and stories are filled with a damp atmosphere. Leaning alone on the window, looking at the bluestone alley at the corner, a long-lost oil-paper umbrella blocks the time that is lower than the eaves.

A few plum rains, a few lotus winds, the south of the Yangtze River is already misty. The moist moss in the small courtyard grows purely in the rain. This season, many people are inquiring about the news about the lotus and the mysterious fragrance of jasmine floating in the evening .I don’t know how many people will remember that there was a woman who once walked through the world in April, and had an agreement with Liankai Xiaxia.

A person, a book, a cup of tea, a curtain of dreams. Sometimes, loneliness is so exciting, and only at this moment, the world will be so calm. The cool wind blows the pages of the book, and the smoke and rain make the dust seal in the book The poems and stories are filled with a damp atmosphere. Leaning alone on the window, looking at the bluestone alley at the corner, a long-lost oil-paper umbrella blocks the time that is lower than the eaves.
